y moved this page to where.

  Thanks.

  Andrew
    -----Original Message-=
----

"documentation" tab, there, you'll find the JUnit cookbook, which is a pret=
ty good start, if you get your Java environment straight.

    regards
    =
Philippe
      -----Original Message-----
      From: Ram Kumar [mailto:y_r=
amkumar@...]
      Sent: woensdag 30 mei 2001 16:33
      To: junit=
@yahoogroups.com
      Subject: Re: [junit] testing junit


      Hi,

    =
  I am a new JUnit user and just downloaded JUnit and trying to work with i=

      Could any one suggest me where to find good docu=
mentation about JUnit?

      Awaiting your immediate reply.

      Thanks,=


      Yamasani.
